languages.text: При получении {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} и в случае провала немедленно смещается на 4 клетки назад, провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

languages.text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} al objetivo, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} o alejarse 4 casillas, provocando {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} al objetivo, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} o alejarse 4 casillas, provocando {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: 対象に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃が命中{/g}するたび、-{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}のペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}にパスしなければならない。失敗すると、瞬時に4マス先まで押し出されて{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the target is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately get pushed 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 対象に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃が命中{/g}するたび、-{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}のペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}にパスしなければならない。失敗すると、瞬時に4マス先まで押し出されて{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発する。

languages.text: 每当成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会立刻被推到4格之外，还会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the target is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately get pushed 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会立刻被推到4格之外，还会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, muss es eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von {uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} bestehen, um nicht sofort 4 Zellen zurückgeworfen zu werden und {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren.
languages.original_text: Whenever the target is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately get pushed 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, muss es eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von {uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} bestehen, um nicht sofort 4 Zellen zurückgeworfen zu werden und {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren.

languages.text: Chaque fois que la cible subit un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g}, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}. En cas d'échec, elle est immédiatement repoussée de 4 cases, ce qui provoque des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

Chaque fois que la cible subit un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g}, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}. languages.text: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde anında 4 hücre uzağa itilerek {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetikler.
